alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 6:24AM CDT until May 15 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Doniphan County in northeastern Kansas... Northwestern Leavenworth County in northeastern Kansas... Atchison County in northeastern Kansas... Southwestern Buchanan County in northwestern Missouri... Northwestern Platte County in west central Missouri... * Until 715 AM CDT. * At 623 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Atchison to near Effingham, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Atchison, Effingham, Rushville, Lancaster, Lewis And Clark Village, Doniphan, De Kalb, Farmington, Iatan, Faucett, Bean Lake, Lewis And Clark Vi, Lowemont, Cummings and Potter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
